description:
Archinstall 2.8.2 menu-based installer for the Arch Linux distribution is now available with various improvements and bug fixes. Work also continues on the new Curses-based implementation.

The post Archinstall 2.8.2 Arch Linux Installer Speeds Up Mirror Loading and Download appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Archinstall 2.8.2 Arch Linux Installer Speeds Up Mirror Loading and Download
